column6: f.p.; C.k.; calcd. from pH dependence and effect on decay of O$_3$ at 410 nm (assuming $k(\ce{O^- + O_2}) = 3.6 \times 10^9$).
p.r.; C.k.; $pK_a(\ce{OH}) = 11.9$ involved in anal.; assumed $k(\ce{^{\cdot}OH} + \ce{BrO_2^-}) = k(\ce{O^-} + \ce{BrO_2^-})$; rel. to $k(\ce{^{\cdot}OH} + \ce{CO_3^{2-}})$.
